error_details.explanation: Incomplete calculation. The term 'photos_scenery' (value: 20) was omitted from the operation.

context.flawed_solution:
#### 25
Lisa took 10 x 3 = <<10*3=30>>30 photos of flowers.
She took 30 - 10 = <<30-10=20>>20 photos of the scenery.
So, Lisa took 10 + 30 = <<10+30=40>>40 photos this week.
Therefore, Lisa took 40 - 15 = <<40-15=25>>25 photos last weekend.
